value:
As a warrior of Aurelis, I have sworn
to fight and die for my country.

If departing from Archanea, the plains
of Aurelis lie beyond Lefcandith
Valley.$k$pThe surrounding mountains form a
natural stronghold mighty enough to
deter most outsiders.

When was the last time you rested?
You should take this chance to do so,
before the exhaustion builds up.

There is certainly no lack of sparring
partners in this castle, and all of
them are experienced warriors.$k$pI want to grow as strong as they are.

I'm off to take my horse out for a
run. If you have time, would you like
to ride it?

I am Vyland, of the knights of Aurelis.
I have greetings from your friend
$Nf.

As long as we are here, we must
never give up any ground.

That went well! It seems we've gotten
used to working together.

If you wish for your foe to crumble,
wear them down by attacking and
withdrawing before they can react.$k$pThat is the most effective way to
fight that I know of.

Hmm... I understand. I would like to
learn more from you later about how
we will fight from now on.

I am Vyland, of the knights of Aurelis.
I am good at leading the charge, so
do not hesitate to ask anything of me.

The Coyote's Men crossed countless
battlefields, ignoring wind and rain,
and Hardin always led the charge.$k$pThe reason Marth's army was able
to defeat Dolhr... It was undeniably
thanks to him.$k$pI sometimes wonder, though... Coyote
is a courageous man, but is joining
Archanea truly for the best?$k$pWolf and the others have no such
qualms. Lord Hardin is our hero.$k$pTo the people of the plains, he is
hope itself. Hope for a better Aurelis.$k$p...I am a warrior of Aurelis. To fight to
the end as one of the Coyote's Men...
That is all I wish for.
はあっ
通さん！
うわっ
Not bad...
Open your eyes!
If I can protect him...
You're being deceived!
We stand tall!
Lord Hardin...
Chuckle
I am Vyland of Aurelis, one of the Coyote's Men.
Oh? There's no need to be so crude.
Among the Coyote's Men, Roshea has always been the kindest of us all.
It was Lord Hardin that freed us from slavery.
Lord Hardin has...changed. It's as if he has become a completely different man...
The truth is... I don't know. I just don't know what I should do.
Will you continue to fight beside me?
All right.
If you say so.
It's going to be fine.
